title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An epic story-driven RPG set in a dark fantasy world filled with monsters, magic, and moral choices.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: A breathtaking open-world western about outlaws, survival, and loyalty in a changing America.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An immersive open-world RPG set in Night City — a place obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification.

title: God of War: Ragnarök
description: Kratos and Atreus embark on a mythic journey to prevent Ragnarok in this cinematic Norse saga.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Explore the mysterious underground kingdom of Hallownest in this atmospheric action platformer.

title: Elden Ring
description: An expansive fantasy world filled with lore, deadly bosses, and breathtaking landscapes, created by FromSoftware.

title: Minecraft
description: Build, explore, and survive in an infinite blocky world limited only by your imagination.

title: Fortnite
description: A vibrant online battle royale game where players build, shoot, and survive until the last one stands.

title: Valorant
description: A tactical 5v5 hero shooter combining precise gunplay with unique agent abilities.

title: Apex Legends
description: A squad-based hero shooter set in the Titanfall universe featuring unique legends and fast-paced combat.

title: Assassin’s Creed Valhalla
description: Live the saga of a Viking raider building their settlement and exploring the Dark Ages of England.

title: Genshin Impact
description: An anime-style open-world adventure game filled with elemental magic and cross-platform play.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: Join Task Force 141 in this fast-paced shooter featuring realistic combat and stunning visuals.

title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
description: A modern reimagining of the survival horror classic, combining action, tension, and beautiful graphics.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: Explore the skies and lands of Hyrule in this creative sequel filled with puzzles and exploration.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Grow crops, raise animals, and build your dream farm life in this relaxing indie hit.

title: Overwatch 2
description: Team up in 5v5 battles with unique heroes, dynamic maps, and fast-paced team combat.

title: Among Us
description: Work together to complete tasks — or sabotage your crewmates in this multiplayer social deduction game.

title: Hades
description: Battle your way out of the Underworld in this stylish, fast-paced roguelike with rich storytelling.

title: Spider-Man 2
description: Swing across New York as Peter Parker and Miles Morales in this superhero action masterpiece.
